attributes.action: force a re-design of the awful 2012 Olympic Games logo
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background: The newly unveiled London 2012 logo is a monumental disaster. It is totally meaningless, uninspiring, anything but iconic and an absolute waste of almost half a million tax payer pounds. Scrap the current logo and allow UK residents to submit their own with a chance to win tickets to all Olympic events. This will guarantee a much better logo, made with more thought and care than an incredibly overrated and untalented design company can muster.

reasons: Duplicate - this is similar to and/or overlaps with an existing petition or petitions
